helpPage.title: Guides & troubleshooting
helpPage.subtitle: Learn how to configure PromptGen from registration to day-to-day operations.

gettingStarted.title: Quick start
gettingStarted.description: Spin up your workspace in minutes.
items: Register with captcha protection, then verify your email using the one-time link we send.
After verification, sign in and the dashboard will greet you with realtime account status.
Open Settings to upload an avatar, pick your preferred model, and toggle cloud sync.

authentication.title: Authentication flow
authentication.description: Stay secure while keeping friction low.
items: Login requests surface inline validation and toast feedback for success and errors.
Email verification panels show remaining resend attempts and rate-limit cooldowns.
Use the verification callback page if you login from an email link inside Electron.

workbench.title: Prompt workbench
workbench.description: Craft and iterate on prompts with keyword governance.
items: Fetch AI-assisted keyword suggestions tied to your current topic.
Separate positive and negative keywords, adjust weights, and auto-save drafts.
Switch between DeepSeek and Volcano Engine models; the UI gracefully falls back when a model is disabled.

models.title: Model credentials
models.description: Securely manage API keys for DeepSeek and future providers.
items: Store encrypted API keys; AES-256-GCM keeps credentials safe at rest.
Enable, disable, or delete models and instantly update your preferred default.
Test connectivity directly from the card and view the last verification time.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting tips
troubleshooting.description: What to try when something feels off.
items: Captcha failing repeatedly? Refresh the image or reload the page to fetch a new captcha.
Verification email missing? Wait for the cooldown timer, then resend or check the spam folder.
Model calls timing out? Confirm the API key status in Settings.

resources.title: More resources
resources.description: Discover community knowledge, source code, and support channels maintained by AB-IN.
resources.note: Powered by AB-IN · ICP License 鲁ICP备2021035431号-1

admin.description: Add or edit release notes directly. Changes are saved immediately.

admin.itemsRequired: Please provide at least one highlight.
admin.translateDescription: Select target locales and publish translated copies together.
admin.translateModelHint: Uses your model credential identified by this key (e.g. deepseek-chat or doubao-1-5-thinking-pro-250415).
admin.translateTargetsRequired: Select at least one target locale.
admin.translateModelRequired: Please provide the translation model key.

logsPage.empty: No changelog entries yet. Use “Create entry” to publish the first update.
